verses.verse: And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about that <S%G1722>while<s%> He was <S%G4336>praying<s%> in a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> <S%G5613>after<s%> He had <S%G3973>finished,<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> of His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G1321>teach<s%> us to <S%G4336>pray<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1321>taught<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>"

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, " <S%G3752>When<s%> you <S%G4336>pray,<s%> <S%G3004>say:<s%> <S%G3962>'Father,<s%> <S%G37>hallowed<s%> be Thy <S%G3686>name.<s%> Thy <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G2064>come.<s%>
<S%G1325>'Give<s%> us <S%G2596>each<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> our <S%G1967>daily<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>

'And <S%G863>forgive<s%> us our <S%G266>sins,<s%> For we <S%G846>ourselves<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G863>forgive<s%> <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who is <S%G3784>indebted<s%> to us. And <S%G1533>lead<s%> us not into <S%G3986>temptation.<s%>' "

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"Suppose<s%> <S%G5101>one<s%> of you shall <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G5384>friend,<s%> and shall <S%G4198>go<s%> to him at <S%G3317>midnight,<s%> and <S%G3004>say<s%> to him, <S%G5384>'Friend,<s%> <S%G5531>lend<s%> me <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G740>loaves;<s%>
for a <S%G5384>friend<s%> of <S%G1473>mine<s%> has <S%G3854>come<s%> to me from a <S%G3598>journey,<s%> and I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>nothing<s%> to <S%G3908>set<s%> <S%G3908>before<s%> him';

and from <S%G2081>inside<s%> he shall <S%G611>answer<s%> and <S%G3004>say,<s%> 'Do not <S%G2873>bother<s%> <S%G3930><s%> me; the <S%G2374>door<s%> has <S%G2235>already<s%> been <S%G2808>shut<s%> and my <S%G3813>children<s%> and I are in <S%G2845>bed;<s%> I <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G450>get<s%> up and <S%G1325>give<s%> you [anything.]'

"I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G1487>though<s%> he will not <S%G450>get<s%> up and <S%G1325>give<s%> him [anything] <S%G1223>because<s%> he is his <S%G5384>friend,<s%> <S%G1065>yet<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of his <S%G335>persistence<s%> he will <S%G1453>get<s%> up and <S%G1325>give<s%> him as <S%G3745>much<s%> as he <S%G5535>needs.<s%>

"And I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G154>ask,<s%> and it shall be <S%G1325>given<s%> to you; <S%G2212>seek,<s%> and you shall <S%G2147>find;<s%> <S%G2925>knock,<s%> and it shall be <S%G455>opened<s%> to you.
"For <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G154>asks,<s%> <S%G2983>receives;<s%> and he who <S%G2212>seeks,<s%> <S%G2147>finds;<s%> and to him who <S%G2925>knocks,<s%> it shall be <S%G455>opened.<s%>

<S%G1161>"Now<s%> <S%G5101>suppose<s%> <S%G5101>one<s%> of you <S%G3962>fathers<s%> is <S%G154>asked<s%> by his <S%G5207>son<s%> for a <S%G2486>fish;<s%> he will not <S%G1929>give<s%> him a <S%G3789>snake<s%> <S%G473>instead<s%> of a <S%G2486>fish,<s%> will he?
<S%G2228>"Or<s%> [if] he is <S%G154>asked<s%> for an <S%G5609>egg,<s%> he will not <S%G1929>give<s%> him a <S%G4651>scorpion,<s%> will he?

<S%G1487>"If<s%> you <S%G3767>then,<s%> <S%G5225>being<s%> <S%G4190>evil,<s%> <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G3609>how<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1390>gifts<s%> to your <S%G5043>children,<s%> <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> shall [your] <S%G1537>heavenly<s%> <S%G3772><s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G154>ask<s%> Him?"

And He was <S%G1544>casting<s%> out a <S%G1140>demon,<s%> and it was <S%G2974>dumb;<s%> and it <S%G1096>came<s%> about that when the <S%G1140>demon<s%> had <S%G1831>gone<s%> out, the <S%G2974>dumb<s%> <S%G2974>man<s%> <S%G2980>spoke;<s%> and the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G2296>marveled.<s%>
But <S%G5100>some<s%> of them <S%G3004>said,<s%> "He <S%G1544>casts<s%> out <S%G1140>demons<s%> by <S%G954>Beelzebul,<s%> the <S%G758>ruler<s%> of the <S%G1140>demons.<s%>"
And <S%G2087>others,<s%> to <S%G3985>test<s%> [Him,] were <S%G2212>demanding<s%> of Him a <S%G4592>sign<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

But He <S%G3609>knew<s%> their <S%G1270>thoughts,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3956>"Any<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G1266>divided<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G1438>itself<s%> is <S%G2049>laid<s%> <S%G2049>waste;<s%> and a <S%G3624>house<s%> [divided] <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G3624>itself<s%> <S%G4098>falls.<s%>

"And <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> is <S%G1266>divided<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> shall his <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G2476>stand<s%>? For you <S%G3004>say<s%> that I <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G1140>demons<s%> by <S%G954>Beelzebul.<s%>

"And <S%G1487>if<s%> I by <S%G954>Beelzebul<s%> <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G1140>demons,<s%> by <S%G5101>whom<s%> do your <S%G5207>sons<s%> <S%G1544>cast<s%> them out? <S%G1223>Consequently<s%> <S%G3778><s%> they shall be your <S%G2923>judges.<s%>

"But <S%G1487>if<s%> I <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G1140>demons<s%> by the <S%G1147>finger<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G5348>come<s%> upon you.

<S%G3752>"When<s%> a <S%G2478>strong<s%> [man,] <S%G2528>fully<s%> <S%G2528>armed,<s%> <S%G5442>guards<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G833>homestead,<s%> his <S%G5225>possessions<s%> are <S%G1722>undisturbed<s%><S%G1515>;<s%>

but <S%G1875>when<s%> someone <S%G2478>stronger<s%> than he <S%G1904>attacks<s%> him and <S%G3528>overpowers<s%> him, he <S%G142>takes<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> from him <S%G3833>all<s%> his <S%G3833>armor<s%> on <S%G3739>which<s%> he had <S%G3982>relied,<s%> and <S%G1239>distributes<s%> his <S%G4661>plunder.<s%>
"He who is not with Me is <S%G2596>against<s%> Me; and he who does not <S%G4863>gather<s%> with Me, <S%G4650>scatters.<s%>

<S%G3752>"When<s%> the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G1831>goes<s%> out of a <S%G444>man,<s%> it <S%G1330>passes<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G504>waterless<s%> <S%G5117>places<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> <S%G372>rest,<s%> and not <S%G2147>finding<s%> any, it <S%G3004>says,<s%> 'I will <S%G5290>return<s%> to my <S%G3624>house<s%> from <S%G3606>which<s%> I <S%G1831>came.<s%>'
"And when it <S%G2064>comes,<s%> it <S%G2147>finds<s%> it <S%G4563>swept<s%> and <S%G2885>put<s%> in <S%G2885>order.<s%>

<S%G5119>"Then<s%> it <S%G4198>goes<s%> and <S%G3880>takes<s%> [along] <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> <S%G4190>more<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> than <S%G1438>itself,<s%> and they <S%G1525>go<s%> in and <S%G2730>live<s%> <S%G1563>there;<s%> and the <S%G2078>last<s%> state of that <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1096>becomes<s%> <S%G5501>worse<s%> than the <S%G4413>first.<s%>"

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about <S%G1722>while<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> of the <S%G1135>women<s%> in the <S%G3793>crowd<s%> <S%G1869>raised<s%> her <S%G5456>voice,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G3107>"Blessed<s%> is the <S%G2836>womb<s%> that <S%G941>bore<s%> You, and the <S%G3149>breasts<s%> at <S%G3739>which<s%> You <S%G2337>nursed.<s%>"

But He <S%G3004>said,<s%> "On the <S%G3303>contrary,<s%> <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3107>blessed<s%> are <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G5442>observe<s%> it."

And as the <S%G3793>crowds<s%> were <S%G1865>increasing,<s%> He <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> is a <S%G4190>wicked<s%> <S%G1074>generation;<s%> it <S%G2212>seeks<s%> for a <S%G4592>sign,<s%> and [yet] <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> shall be <S%G1325>given<s%> to it but the <S%G4592>sign<s%> of <S%G2495>Jonah.<s%>

"For <S%G2531>just<s%> as <S%G2495>Jonah<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> a <S%G4592>sign<s%> to the <S%G3536>Ninevites,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> shall the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> be to <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation.<s%>

"The <S%G938>Queen<s%> of the <S%G3558>South<s%> shall <S%G1453>rise<s%> up with the <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> at the <S%G2920>judgment<s%> and <S%G2632>condemn<s%> them, <S%G3754>because<s%> she <S%G2064>came<s%> from the <S%G4009>ends<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G4672>Solomon;<s%> and <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G4183>something<s%> <S%G4183>greater<s%> than <S%G4672>Solomon<s%> is <S%G5602>here.<s%>

"The <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G3536>Nineveh<s%> shall <S%G450>stand<s%> up with <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> at the <S%G2920>judgment<s%> and <S%G2632>condemn<s%> it, <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G3340>repented<s%> at the <S%G2782>preaching<s%> of <S%G2495>Jonah;<s%> and <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G4183>something<s%> <S%G4183>greater<s%> than <S%G2495>Jonah<s%> is <S%G5602>here.<s%>

<S%G3762>"No<s%> <S%G3762>one,<s%> after <S%G681>lighting<s%> a <S%G3088>lamp,<s%> <S%G5087>puts<s%> it <S%G5087>away<s%> in a <S%G2926>cellar,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> a peck-measure, but on the <S%G3087>lampstand,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G1531>enter<s%> may <S%G991>see<s%> the <S%G5338>light.<s%>

"The <S%G3088>lamp<s%> of your <S%G4983>body<s%> is your <S%G3788>eye;<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> your <S%G3788>eye<s%> is <S%G573>clear,<s%> your <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> is <S%G5460>full<s%> of <S%G5460>light;<s%> but <S%G1875>when<s%> it is <S%G4190>bad,<s%> your <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> is <S%G4652>full<s%> of <S%G4652>darkness.<s%>
<S%G3767>"Then<s%> <S%G4648>watch<s%> out that the <S%G5457>light<s%> in you may not be <S%G4655>darkness.<s%>

<S%G1487>"If<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> your <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> is <S%G5460>full<s%> of <S%G5460>light,<s%> with <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G4652>dark<s%> <S%G3313>part<s%> in it, it shall be <S%G3650>wholly<s%> <S%G5460>illumined,<s%> as <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G3088>lamp<s%> <S%G5461>illumines<s%> you with its <S%G796>rays.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1722>when<s%> He had <S%G2980>spoken,<s%> a <S%G5330>Pharisee<s%> <S%G2065>asked<s%> Him to <S%G709>have<s%> <S%G709>lunch<s%> with him; and He <S%G1525>went<s%> in, and <S%G377>reclined<s%> [at the table.]

And when the <S%G5330>Pharisee<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> it, he was <S%G2296>surprised<s%> that He had not <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G907>ceremonially<s%> <S%G907>washed<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G712>meal.<s%>

But the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G3568>"Now<s%> you <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2511>clean<s%> the <S%G1855>outside<s%> of the <S%G4221>cup<s%> and of the <S%G4094>platter;<s%> but <S%G2081>inside<s%> of you, you are <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G724>robbery<s%> and <S%G4189>wickedness.<s%>
"You <S%G878>foolish<s%> <S%G878>ones,<s%> did not He who <S%G4160>made<s%> the <S%G1855>outside<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> the <S%G2081>inside<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>?
"But <S%G1325>give<s%> that which is <S%G1751>within<s%> as <S%G1654>charity,<s%> and <S%G2400>then<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G2513>clean<s%> for you.

"But <S%G3759>woe<s%> to you <S%G5330>Pharisees!<s%> For you <S%G586>pay<s%> <S%G586>tithe<s%> of <S%G2238>mint<s%> and <S%G4076>rue<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> [kind of] <S%G3001>garden<s%> <S%G3001>herb,<s%> and [yet] <S%G3928>disregard<s%> <S%G2920>justice<s%> and the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> but <S%G3778>these<s%> are the <S%G3778>things<s%> you <S%G1163>should<s%> have <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G3361>without<s%> <S%G3935>neglecting<s%> the <S%G2548>others.<s%>

<S%G3759>"Woe<s%> to you <S%G5330>Pharisees!<s%> For you <S%G25>love<s%> the <S%G4410>front<s%> <S%G4410>seats<s%> in the <S%G4864>synagogues,<s%> and the respectful <S%G783>greetings<s%> in the <S%G58>market<s%> <S%G58>places.<s%>

<S%G3759>"Woe<s%> to you! For you are <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G82>concealed<s%> <S%G3419>tombs,<s%> and the <S%G444>people<s%> who <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G1883>over<s%> [them] are <S%G3756>unaware<s%> <S%G3609><s%> [of it.]"

And <S%G5100>one<s%> of the <S%G3544>lawyers<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him in <S%G611>reply,<s%> <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> when You <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> You <S%G5195>insult<s%> us <S%G2532>too.<s%>"

But He <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3759>"Woe<s%> to you <S%G3544>lawyers<s%> as <S%G2532>well!<s%> For you <S%G5412>weigh<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G5412>down<s%> with <S%G5413>burdens<s%> <S%G1419>hard<s%> to <S%G1419>bear,<s%> <S%G2532>while<s%> you <S%G846>yourselves<s%> will not even <S%G4379>touch<s%> the <S%G5413>burdens<s%> with <S%G1520>one<s%> of your <S%G1147>fingers.<s%>
<S%G3759>"Woe<s%> to you! For you <S%G3618>build<s%> the <S%G3419>tombs<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> and [it was] your <S%G3962>fathers<s%> [who] <S%G615>killed<s%> them.

<S%G686>"Consequently,<s%> you are <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> and <S%G4909>approve<s%> the <S%G2041>deeds<s%> of your <S%G3962>fathers;<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> it was they who <S%G615>killed<s%> them, and you <S%G3618>build<s%> [their tombs.]

"For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> 'I will <S%G649>send<s%> to them <S%G4396>prophets<s%> and <S%G652>apostles,<s%> and [some] of them they will <S%G615>kill<s%> and [some] they will <S%G1377>persecute,<s%>

in <S%G2443>order<s%> that the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G7062>shed<s%> <S%G575>since<s%> the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> may be <S%G1567>charged<s%> <S%G575>against<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation,<s%>

from the <S%G129>blood<s%> of Abel to the <S%G6>blood<s%> of <S%G129>Zechariah,<s%> who <S%G2197>perished<s%> <S%G622>between<s%> the <S%G3342>altar<s%> and the <S%G2379>house<s%> [of God;] <S%G3624>yes,<s%> I <S%G3483>tell<s%> you, it shall be <S%G3004>charged<s%> <S%G1567>against<s%> <S%G575>this<s%> <S%G3778>generation.<s%>'
